## NOTE: Before running the benchmarking script, please update all "/path/to/" file paths with the file path in your local directory. 
## This should be the folder containing all the output files generated by iMPP

## BWA files (.sam)
bwa_ref = /path/to/ref.sam
bwa_edge = /path/to/edges.sam
bwa_path = /path/to/paths.sam
bwa_sgacg = /path/to/sga.contig.sam
bwa_spadescg = /path/to/spades.contig.sam
##################
## Gene calling files (.out)
fgs_ref = /path/to/refseq_genes.gff
fgs_read = /path/to/reads.out
fgs_edge = /path/to/edges.merged.120.out
fgs_path = /path/to/paths.merged.120.out
fgs_sgacg = /path/to/sga/contigs.out
fgs_spadescg = /path/to/spades/contigs.out
###
fastq = /path/to/reads.namemap.txt
sixfr = /path/to/reads.translated.mapped.fasta
